edu.harvard.hul.ois.mets.helper
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.harvard.hul.ois.mets.helper.Schema
public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulate the prefix, namespace URI, and schema location URI of a namespace-qualified schema.
